price: Gatii xiqqaa, maallaqa lakkaa’amtuutti, isa gurguran, Isa keessattis danta dhaboota irraa ta’an. {2}
arabic: وَشَرَوۡهُ بِثَمَنِۭ بَخۡسٖ دَرَٰهِمَ مَعۡدُودَةٖ وَكَانُواْ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلزَّٰهِدِينَ
footnotes: {2} obboleeyantu daldaltoota eelaa baasan sanitti rakishatti gurguratan.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darāhima maʿdūdatin wakānū fīhi mina al-zāhidīna
